titles.title: Risk-Based Special Assessment Act

A bill to amend the National Housing Act to authorize the Federal Savings and Loan Insurance Corporation to assess the special assessment on the basis of risk criteria which the Corporation may develop.

bill.summary: 6/14/1988--Introduced. Risk-Based Special Assessment Act - Amends the National Housing Act to authorize the Federal Savings and Loan Insurance Corporation (FSLIC) to: (1) establish criteria for measuring and determining the degree to which any insured institution poses a risk to the reserves of the FSLIC; (2) assess an additional insurance premium against insured institutions based on such risk; and (3) establish a scale for a range of such additional premiums proportionate to the risk posed by institutions. Sets forth the factors to be considered in establishing the criteria for measuring and determining risk.
